values:
so yesterday was ten years to the day that my grandma died. bloody april fools day bless her. had a lovely day remembering her by myself & a little with my aunt [her sister] who i saw on the bus on the way to the crem <3 

only downer was that grandma isn't in the book of rememberance, which she should be. gonna look into that over the weekend.

thanks for everything gran, ten years may be a long time, but never forgotten <3

it's been far too long & i know over the last year i've really neglected this journal, however, i could never ever delete it as it holds so many wonderful memories & amazing friendships for me <3

lives change so much once we leave high school but i want anyone to know reading this that i'd for us to get back in touch at some point, even if not on here :D

i'm on facebook under fran 'fleety' houlton & i'm on twitter, [which i use a lot!] at xhippy_chickx . i really really hope that i'll see some of you there <3

so i'm not even gonna bother not cutting any of this, as it just seems so pointless, but still.
since i hit my teens i have had a continous battle with my weight. when i was at high school, for some reason it bothered me, but it didn't. i could handle being the "fat kid" i guess because there were people who were being bullied more than i was. back then i was never told about any of the weight programmes that may [or may not] have been avaliable to me, so i just got on with it. i loved my food & i overate, i guess sometimes i did comfort eat, but not cos people were bullying me about my weight, it got more out of control when my gran died. looking back, i can pinpoint that moment to my constant weight gain.
i guess as i got a little older at high school, it did bug me, but cos i never actually hung out with "the cool, thin people" [those who wore really skinny jeans etc] i just didn't really notice it. we only had one really skinny friend in our group so i didn't really know any different. obviously pe was tough, but i hid under baggy clothes.
now that i'm 22, my weight is still an issue for me, but it's never at the forefront of my mind, but a recent issue has made me realise it is time to knuckle down & shed some of it, i do notice my weight more now & i am horrified it got like this. at the beginning of week i decided to do something about it, i gave myself bank holiday monday off, & started on tuesday & since then have done ok. 
however, a comment by my dad this morning really set me back. because of all my weight gain, i have stretchmarks, which i've got used to. anyway, this morning he brought them up when i lent over the chair & my tshirt rode up. he was all like "oh fran did you know you have stretchmarks" he's always comments about my weight & makes remarks, but he's hardly a role model to me. at least my mum actually bothers to try & help me loose weight, she never makes rude comments, just suggests other things to me, like alternatives and stuff. 
the last time this happened, i asked dad to back off & at least offer me words of encouragement, but he's just the same as he ever was. i hate it =(

sorry about that, needed to come off my chest

i think i shall be sighing up for a convent pretty soon. the male species is a baffling thing & tbh, i'm done with them. course i won't really join a convent but you know, nice to joke during hard times right?

wish he'd just been honest with me from the start though...

today i found out a very good friend of mine, is suicidal. i don't know how this makes me feel. relieved that she finally told me, upset that i've found out it horrible conditions, angry at her for wanting to end everything & leave her family in such a cruel way  & desperate for her to regain the strength to carry on.

i'd like to think i've gotten through to her this time & i'm proud of myself, for even though i cried during our conversation i remained strong & positive for her sake. i know i've made a difference, because i just received the most simple, yet wonderful text from her, that just says "thanks for that"

lauren sweetheart, you mean the world to me, & i love you forever xx

today has been a total disaster. i don't even think i want to speak to lauren anymore, i want to resolve things, but everytime i try & explain the way she is she twists things around & like makes me feel really guilty & stuff. it's weird & tbh really hard to talk about. the more she pushes me away & makes me feel shit, the more i just want to try so fucking hard to make it worse. if anyones seem mean girls, it's a bit like the relationship between gretchen & regina. really bad example but you know. 

i've been on my own all day. mum & dad went to the home to see leslie & i still can't bring myself to go, i don't think he has much longer left to live but it's so hard to go there. it's that hard, that i haven't visited him in the home since he got there. thats so bad =(
rus was at his girlfriends all day so i've been all by myself, there's not been much happening on the msn front & most of my friends where elsewhere today. it's horrible to be on your own when you feel like crap as well & makes you think twice as long & twice as hard. i haven't cried today but i think i'm about to.

we drove past the road leading to the crem where my gran's funeral took place today. i wanted to go up but we were in a hurry to get rus back for his work shift, i still feel so bad that we weren't there on thursday.

listening to susan boyle's wild horses atm, not good =,(

my life is in serius need of a makeover. something somewhere has gone wrong with me & i don't like. i haven't posted an lj entry in forever, i'm extremely lazy, i can't be bothered with life & i feel like i'm slipping away from friends. namely lauren [who i most definately do not want to loose] & a couple of lj-ers. i want to reconnect with them as well as sort myself out properly.

i'll start with the basics. in recent weeks & months i felt increasingly down, cried a lot at really pathetic things [& serious also], my appetite is so up & down at the moment & i'm eating at funny times of the day or not at all, yet no weight is coming off or going on me. it occured to me, that i might be suffering from some sort of depression, so i had a look & some of the symptoms fit. i'm not sure what kind yet, maybe SAD, or even minor, but whatever it is, it's making me think about harming myself again which is bad & i totlally know i have to get over it. i don't want to be this way anymore, but when i'm like this i overthink things. trouble is though, there are times when i'm like really happy, like over silly things when i talk to people, when my best mate came back from uni & when i'm at work & getting on with management. i don't know if it's whats happened recently regarding my job. i should probably explain that.

basically. about two months ago my boss said that i needed tp up my game at work & that i was on an "unrecorded verbal warning" if she didn't see improvement in say a week, i'd be on an actual verbal warning that could go on record & stuff. anyway, about three weeks after that she spoke to me about something i hadn't done right at work, but never told me it was the official verbal warning, so a few weeks later when she issued me with an informal warning sheet i was like wtf?! anyway, she said it was something to be concerned about, but also not to worry about it. i had four weeks to improve the things we agreed on & that if things were no different, the official disciplinaries would start.

personally, me & another work colleague who i'm close to outside of work, both said that we think they're out to fire someone & because i am a little sloppy with my job, i'm the target. there was another incident regarding a microwave too that i think could have got me fired if it was my fault [which it wasn't] but i won't go into that now.
i think a lot of this "depressive state" was started by everything that happened at work, yet my bosses have this way of making me feel happy when they're not pissed off with me. if that makes any sense. it's only when i get home & talk to my parents that i realise that maybe i am being kicked down & pushed around by them. my dad says there's no way i shouold be a poushover but thats the way i've always been. someone says bark like a dog & i'll do it =/

i've also being missing my gran a lot recently. she died a year ago yesterday & prior to yesterday i'd had a talk with mum about how i felt. i never realised that nine years on it could still fucking hurt like hell. i don't think i ever got over the death of my grandma & it pains me to say that i only thought about her twice yesterday. dad didn't even mention her to me which i thought he would, there was no visit to the crem, just me alone with my thoughts & driving myself mad. i miss her so much cos there were so many things i wanted to share with her, like my gcse & a level results, & daft things like getting on a bus straight after school to go & spend time with her. i reckon she'd be the one i'd be talking to about all this now as well, cos regardless of her relationship with my parents, she'd always have the time to talk to me & keep my secrets. if i could be half the person she was, i know i'd have achieved something with my life.

i have a sudden urge to learn too. i was supposed to be looking at courses months ago, but never seemed bothered, but all of a sudden i want to learn, i want to travel & try new things. the problem is the job & the money, i'm not even earning 70 quid a week atm. everyone keeps telling me to get another job but it's so hard & time consuming.

i have so many plans, yet no idea which direction i'm going in. i feel like i'm going at a hundred miles an hour sometimes, yet i'm stuck in the mud & the wheels just spinning with no way of escape. i wish i dealt with things easily, which is why i'm going to attempt to sort things out. i'm sick of feeling sad all the time & my brother has offered to come to the doctors to see if i can try & get something for it & clear the crap away for good this time.

i just did this elsewhere. stolen from <lj user=forgiveninasong>

1. If you're on my friends list, I want to know 36 things about you. I don't care if we never talk, or if we already know everything about each other. Short and sweet or long and detailed, all is good.

2. Comment here with your answers and repost the questionnaire on your own journal.

01) Are you currently in a serious relationship?
02) What was your dream growing up?
03) What talent do you wish you had?
04) If I bought you a drink what would it be?
05) Favorite vegetable?
06) What was the last book you read?
07) What zodiac sign are you?
08) Any Tattoos and/or Piercings? Explain where.
09) Worst Habit?
10) If you saw me walking down the street would you offer me a ride?
11) What is your favorite sport?
12) Do you have a Pessimistic or Optimistic attitude?
13) What would you do if you were stuck in an elevator with me?
14) Worst thing to ever happen to you?
15) Tell me one weird fact about you.
16) Do you have any pets?
17) What if I showed up at your house unexpectedly?
18) What was your first impression of me?
19) Do you think clowns are cute or scary?
20) If you could change one thing about how you look, what would it be?
21) Would you be my crime partner or my conscience?
22) What color eyes do you have?
23) Ever been arrested?
24) Bottle or can soda?
25) If you won $10,000 today, what would you do with it?
26) What's your favorite place to hang out at?
27) Do you believe in ghosts?
28) Favorite thing to do in your spare time?
29) Do you swear a lot?
30) Biggest pet peeve?
31) In one word, how would you describe yourself?
32) Do you believe/appreciate romance?
33) Favourite and least favourite food?
34) Do you believe in God?
35) Will you repost this so I can fill it out and do the same for you?
36) Favourite band(s) of ALL time:

oh holy crap! ebay & paypal are driving me up the wall! i just don't get it, there's so much stuff to take in & learn. i just want to sell my tickets & be done with it. urgh =/

in other news, moonlight possibly returning?! EEEEEEEPS! <3 <3

wow. it's been a while folks....

in all fair'ness the past sixmonths have been pretty shit, i won't bore you with the details but i'm hoping that 2010 will be better =)

anyway, i hope you all had a lovely christmas & santa was kind to you all. & while i'm here i'd just like to wish you all a happy & safe new year, and i hope we can all regain contact asap.

love to you all

fran x

So I chose to watch Primeval over Robin Hood & I'm so glad I did <3 Primeval kicked ass & I personally think it was the strongest season opener so far. Andrew's comic timing is always genius, & Hannah & Lucy have now joined the ranks xD Dad just looked at me as if I were crazy when I started laughing. He doesn't get it. *rolls eyes* I was reading Closer at work this morning & apparently Abby & Connor are together now? Can anyone confirm/deny this? & was there any indication in the episode that there were a couple? Also congratulations to Hannah & Andrew, who are officially engaged now <3 
 
I am completely in love, with the new Girls Aoud track. I know it's very lame but I think it might have something to do with them performing it on Dancing on Ice a few weeks ago. I don't know why that makes a difference but still xD Everytime I hear it [which is a lot right now!] I just want to get up & dance, it's actually quite worrying xD

As usual there's a shedload of rumours pointing towards a nasty end to the Ronnie/Danielle storyline at the end of next week. I stay optimistic but even that's starting to fade =(

It's Nan's 80th birthday "do" tomorrow. I'm dreading it but not in the way you might think. I love my family tonnes but sopmetimes they don't half waffle on xD At least this time I shall actually have some productive things to talk about, like Weightwatchers, my 21st & my NVQ. Gosh I sound like an old lady! Wish me luck!

Love to all x

Jeeeze, it's been a while hasn't it.

The Hub 2 kicked ass, & this year I actually made friends, welcome to the journal  ,  & who could forget  =D the two latter are my Kai Owen Dance Crew Posse <3 Undoubtedly the phot's will get added at some point. Burn Gorman & Tom Price are like the nicest guys ever. Can I marry Burn please? More photo's & gossip to come when I have some time.

I'm finally kicking Weightwatchers ass! I got my 10% the other week [then put half a pound on the week after xD] & I'm 2 & a half pounds off loosing a stone, so I'm really pleased about that. What's more is that people are noticing =]

Eastenders is kicking ass right now! Ok, so the storyiline has been cranked up a notch & can be painful at times to watch, but it won't be long before Ronnie finds out about Danielle. So. Can't. Wait. <3

Righty, signing off now but there will be a better update soon I swear, just officially saying hi to the awesome people above & spazzing about weightloss & Eastenders xD

I would just like to say, I usually dislike the Brits, but this year was pretty awesome =D

& I am now an official groupie to Neil Tennant & Brandon Flowers <3 who kicked complete ass together

OMG! Four pounds off at Weightwatechers last night! I've now lost half a stone so far now & I'm so stoked =D

That is all ^_^

Fancied a change. Well, actually it's the same layout I've used before but I decided to switch again because I got bored =P Also had a journal name change & a mood theme change.

Just a quick thank you to start with to  & also  for the wonderful birthday messages, I have meant to message you back & I haven't so consider yourself officially thanked =D

Weightwatchers is slowly going down the toilet *rolls eyes* I knew I would from doing om to being really really bad. Meeting tonight & I'm totally dreading it, last week was called off for snow & I can hardly have this week off too... my leader will murder me though if I don't loose =/ I'm thinking of perhaps seeing if Weightwatchers can start a worldwide exercise class or something but meh *shrugs*

I've started watching Eastenders religiously again too =O I used to watch it this way years ago & since then have watched the odd few, but now it's like "OMG! She's watching it again!" LOL! I don't care though. I really love the storyline between Ronnie & Danielle atm, just praying it comes out soon though, t'will be one of these episodes that goes down in Eastenders history me thinks & not just because it's dragged on xD It's though of Danielle just finally coming out of her shell & yelling to Ronnie "You're my mum!" & Ronnie & Jack are so adorable too <3 

Also loving Being Human. I missed the pilot last year & I wasn't that bothered until I went to The Hub & someone mentioned it. I thought, ooo, sounds like something I'd like & I do. It's different, & scripted in an odd way but I'm really enjoying it. Feel really sorry for Anne though =( & trying to work Mitchell out makes my brain hurt loads xD

I finally got my iPod working after two nights of yelling at it & trying hard not to throw it at the wall! It's so easy to use, yet I was making it harder. & all of a sudden it's like "LOADS OF SPACE FOR CHUNEZZZZ!" =P Good times.

I am so sick of snow too, & work, not the creche but the bakery. Gah I wish they'd just fuck off sometimes, luckily Ronnie's back this week so I'll have someone on my wavelength again, I missed her tonnes.

I finally gave up with Breaking Dawn, it got silly in my eyes. I'll probably pick it up again in a few months or so but for now it has a permanant home in my drawer. Twilight was groundbreaking, the rest a little meh. I'm reading the new Belle De Jour one now.

Need to start savingggg. There's a stack of stuff I want to do this year including Cardiff, NTA's, The Hub 2, Oliver!, Dreamboats & Petticoats, Robin Hood & I still owe mum for the John Barrowman concert. We'll get there =)

Hope everyone is well x

Gakked from  

Rules: IT'S HARDER THAN IT LOOKS! HIT FORWARD, ERASE MY ANSWERS, ENTER YOURS, POST IT TO YOUR OWN LJ! USE THE 1ST LETTER OF YOUR NAME TO ANSWER EACH OF THE FOLLOWING QUESTIONS.
THEY HAVE TO BE REAL PLACES, NAMES, THINGS. NOTHING MADE UP! TRY TO USE DIFFERENT ANSWERS IF THE PERSON IN FRONT OF YOU HAD THE SAME 1ST INITIAL.

1. What is your name: Fran

2. A 4 letter word: Free =D

3. A boy's name: Freddie

4. A girl's name: Freda

5. An occupation: FARMER! xD

6. A color: Fushia

7. Something you wear: Flares! =P

8. A Beverage: Fanta

9. Something found in a bathroom: Flowers for the homely types? =P Floral wallpaper for the grannies? xD

10. A place: Florida

11. Something you shout: The word cannot be repeated here xD
... John Barrowman could start laughing in the middle of a song, on his own xD Best. Panto trip. Ever *giggles*

Today was my first day working in creche for my childcare course. I loved in and was completely in my element there & now I feel like I finally have some sense of belonging somewhere. I know where I want to go in life & I know how to acheive it. My only other question, which will need a little research is whether I could go onto & would benefit from Uni after I finish the course, thats going to take me a while to look at & decide, plus my brother may start this year so I mkight be able to go, but, it's somehting to think about.
& the guy working on reception is soooo cue ^_^

On a side note, I adore this song. It makes me want to go out clubbing =D

T-i-g-g-errrrrrrrr definately =D Full of energy [most of the time], hyper as hell and bouncy. *grins*

Yea, I didn't have a writers block I just really wanted to answer the question =P
Urgh, you suddenly realise how into a ship you are when it's ripped away from you. =(

Sorry about the double post & spam-age, the LJ cut is confusing me =[ Just click the links till you get the full post on the previous entry.

After being in Birmingham for most of the day & spending so much time on our feet we were delighted when we were finally allowed to go into the theatre!
I always find the best part about going to the pantomine is the anticipation before the show starts, you have the High School Musical soundtracks playing, kids getting excited & the stage curtain reads the name of the panto you're seeing & about ten minutes before it did start they played pictures of the Merry Men out. & then when the announcer tells you the panto is about to start & the conducter issues the band to start the butterflies start. Or at least in my case thats what happens & has done since I was small.
In my opinion, the opening wasn't as strong as Aladdin had been, when Aladdin started they began with a well known upbeat song, I didn't know what the song was & I caught sight of one of the kids faces to the other side of me who was sort of confused, but I loved how Marion didn't like Robin at the beginning & then grew to love him, practically the same as the BBC series <3 
As you always get with John the script was full of innuendo that all the adults & Torchwood fans just went crazy for [John told us to calm down so much!] & also there were the Who references for the kids. One of the Merry Men was gay [or at least acted camp!] & I'm pretty sure was trying to "outgay" John in real life too, if that makes any sense! Will Scarlett was adorable & very funny, played by a ventriliquist who had a very sexually active puppet & kept picking on this amazing guy Andy who was sat in the audience xD I might buy his live DVD when I go next time becuase he was really good. The plot was you're usual mix of jokes, love, bad guys & freaky alien things that really shouldn't be there xD & as the story progressed I found myself enjoying it more than Aladdin. I think that was because John & Helen had so much more chemistry than his co-star last year. & JOHN SKATED! <333333 So, pictures, all of three xD

Pulling daft faces before the performance, I was admiring John's bum on the poster opposite us xD
 

I actually adore this photo of the two of us. I don't see as much of my best mate as I used to & we took ages perfecting the picture [believe me there were some really dodgy ones xD]



& finally me & teh Barrowman <333333 The hatttttttttttt xD


I'm pleased with the choice of new Doctor, he seems a little wacky & his hair is a little... odd xD I had no idea who he was until they played the clips I was like "OMG! JIM!!!!" & a [sort of] Who connection with the Billster. Will miss DT immensely though =[

Right folks! Photo time. This is where all respect you had for me is lost xD

First up, this is my brother Rus on the left & his mate Lawley, who went as Captain Condom & Deputy Durex. I dunno either, but Lawley actually won the prize cos Rus didn't last past 10:30 *rolls eyes*



Next up, is Mum & Dad's friend Rita, who looked stunning as a Moulin Rouge dancer



Dad [Gay Scotsman *rolls eyes*] & Rita



Big Dave, as a Laydeeee xD [& mighty fine he looks too! He's now my officially adopted Big Bro <3]



& finally, me with my dad as Magenta from the Rocky Horror Show. Please be aware I had been drinking when this photo was taken xD



It was a good night I guess, I had a fair amount to drink & Big Dave gave me a shot =P He was like everyone else has had one Miss Fran, so now it's your turn xD Big Bro is leading me up the wrong road *tut tut* Was a bit nasty though & didn't taste as tropical should! My brother, as mentioned was wasted pretty early on & missed bringing the New Year in, & I got a bit upset cos Mum was ill & my best mate didn't go as she usually does. Then we had to leave early cos the dog had a fit =[ I still had a good time though [and managed to pull =P]

John Barrowman gets lovier everytime I see & meet him <3 Roll on the 25th =D [will post pictures, waffle & New Years Eve pictures when I finish work]

New Doctor to be announced tonight, my money for some odd & unknown reason, is on a female...

So, to celebrate the New Year we're off to a "Leather, Lace, Lycra" party & after many a debate I've decided to go for an extreme costume & transform myself into Magenta from The Rocky Horror Picture Show xD Y/N? I got most of the costume today but there are a few bits missing atm. I'll post pictures once I sober up as tomorrow seems like it'll be a long day =P

Happy New Year too all on the flist =D

Hey, hope you all had a fab Christmas & got what you wanted =D Sorry there was no Merry Christmas post, I meant to do one & I got completely swamped in other things, this is the first time the PC has been on since last Tuesday =S & thank you all for your kind words in the last post, really made today a little better

Christmas Day went wrong =( My nan & her partner can over & he's really not well. His mind seems to slowly be going, though he remembers us & such but he forgets little things, making me wonder whether or not he's in the first stages of Alzheimers [sp?] Anyway, he forgot to get my nan a card or present & she gets upset about those little things & my mum ended up consoling her over the phone before she even got here =/ There was a lot of quiet & awkward moments between us & them too.
Then, I got home today, rang the doorbell & dad sort of stromed to the door, opened it & walked off. I thought, ok what the hell, followed him & found mum crying in the living room, as you do I thought the worse [that Nan's partner had died, which I think isn't true] Mum told me to leave & I did and went to speak to my brother who knew nothing, & finally just came in here & like I said, I know nothing. Although, money & soliciters have been mentioned =/ So I'm trying to drain it all out with Moonlight, but the worry is still there...

Sorry for waffling on, I hope you are all ok x

So, remember all that crap I had with Amy a few months back, well she contacted me again & this time I actually felt as if I could talk to her. She's still badgering on about her panto ticket & wants to meet me in town to retrieve it but I refuse because I still don't think I trust her. Mind you, at least we're talking over Facebook now which is a major improvement. She keeps saying all of these things & I don't know how to take them, one minute she seems fine with me, the next minute she making petty remarks about previous messages. & she seems pretty depressed. Unless it's the sympathy vote? Anyway, I decided to stop being a bitch & "do what the Doctor would do" so I've taken the moral high ground & said that the ticket was always hers [small white lie but I was really annoyed with her before!] She has the details & we'll arrange some other stuff when the time is closer, all she has to do is show up *shrugs* Ball's in her court now...

I am once again alone in the house. I seriously have no life, but maybe I like it that way. Most people seem offended when they meet me & discover what I'm like anyway & my closest mates & LJ mates have just got used to me, or at least I think they have xD I don't drink a lot, I always try not to touch drugs [although mates around me have done them] & I don't socially smoke, most people think I'm boring & actually I suppose I think the same about them. They're all the same around here, I need to live somewhere that doesn't breed clones all over the place *rolls eyes*

I started Weightwatchers 5 weeks ago! & so far I've lost 5 & a half pounds [but put a pound on tonight!] Sometimes I struggle cos I relied on crap food for so long & then I see pictures of woman who are thin but also have amazing curves & I think, thats my goal! which usually spurs me on again. I go with mum's friend so I have a shoulder to lean on if I need to & we decided that we can indulge on Christmas Eve, Christmas Day & Boxing Day but get straight back on track afterwards.

Speaking of Christmas, I'm all shopped out, wrapped up & nearly all sent. I have my managers to hand over tomorrow & then I think thats it! Finally! LOL! Doesn't feel much like Christmas this year, I really don't know why, possibly because a month after I'll be 21 & actually properly beginning my 20's as a "real" adult. Scary thought xD

Anyway, I hope you're all ok & life is treating you well. I do read your entries but being a busy season I haven't replied. I am an awful person & I'm sorry. I'll do better in 2009 I swear it =D Love to all x
Urgh, I have an evil cold, a sore throat, an addiction to banana on toast & new [re]obsession with Home & Away. Could life get any better? xD

I am a silly, romantic, hopeless sobbing mess right now, & you know why? Cos Malachy & Mercedes got married in Hollyoaks Later & cos Gerard McCarthy sang the Use Somebody track by Kings of Leon. Jesus what is wrong with me?! xD
OMG! I want original Funhouse back. With Pat Sharp's hair & all! xD

I feel good for once. 

The doctor has provided me with a sick note, so that I can have a little time off work to see whether or not this skin rash heals & so far it is, which, although it pleases me in terms of it's going, it's kind of bad cos I think I'm allergic to something at work. At the risk of contradicting myself though, I don't actually want to leave. Well, I do, but not till I find another job. Hopefully *crosses everything* I can secure me a place at the Birmingham Hippodrome which I'm fully into the process of applying for, it will probably only be part time, but thats how I started at Cooks, only to be moved onto full time about a year into my job.

I also have tickets to go & see John Barrowman in concert next year. I couldn't go last year because he was doing Birmingham [xD , so immature!] on mum's birthday, but mum managed to get us really good seats last night =D I know mum doesn't like him much but it'll be a chance for us to bond over something I suppose, besides, she may even end up liking him. I've heard tonnes about his concerts last year, mainly positive & how he has such stage charisma & I'm so excited ^_^

Hollyoaks Later begins next week, Mamma Mia is out on DVD, I fianlly finished watching Hannah Montana [absolutely love it! xD] I have some time off & I'm finally starting to feel myself again. Life is most definately

I don't wish to scare anyone, but Hannah Montana is so damn addictive xD 

Thats all I wanted to say =P

Alright so I'm naughty & haven't updated, but things have been piling & yea *shifty eyes*

Name your top six favourite shows before reading the questions!

1. Moonlight 
2. Doctor Who
3. Heroes
4. Hollyoaks
5. Torchwood
6. Primeval


 1. Who is your favorite character from #2?
Jackie Tyler xD
 

2. Who is your least favourite character from #4?
Dom Reiley *rolls eyes*
 

3. What would a crossover between #1 and #5 include?
 The Torchwood team travelling to LA to meet the mysterious Mick St John & uncover the dodgy dealings of Josef xD & maybe Beth questionning her relationship with Beth when she gets down & dirty with Ianto Jones... yea, RTD should hire me xD

4. What is your favourite ship from #6
Abby/Connor, but I'm starting to get Cutter/Claudia & also Cutter/Jenny =D
 

5. If you were to set one person from #3 and one person from #6 on a blind date, who would they be?
From 6 it would deffo be Jenny, & from 3 I think Nathan might be good for her?
 

6. If you could meet one person from #4 and spend the day with them, who would it be, and what would you do?
Zoe Lister, for maximum wine drinkage xD

7. If you could change one thing about #2's plot line, what would you change?
Only one? Maybe that Donna stayed with Ten at the end of Journey's End, because she turned out to be awesome
 

8. Explain a relationship between two people (not necessarily romantic) from show #5, and why you like the relationship between them.
Gwen & Jack, as a friendship. Cos at the end of the day whatever happens they will always forgive one another <3
 

9. If the lead title characters (first name in the credits) from #1 and #3 were both drowning, and you could only save one, who would it be?
Jesus xD Well, Mick is immortal anyway, & none of the Heroes gang are main cast, buuuuut I'd save Peter, see tonights BBC Three ep for more information...
 

10.If you wereable to add a new character, any kind of character you wanted, to the storyline for #6, what would the character be like, and what would their role be?
Ermmm. Maybe a proper scienetist person, or a forensic. I dunno why though =/
 

11. What happens in your favourite episode of show #2?
All the companions get together to save the Doctor, kick Dalek ass & blow Davoros to smitherins. & also Donna loses her memories =(
 

12. If you could kill off one of the characters in #1, who would it be and how would you do it?
Jesus, their all immortal bar Beth & I like her =( ooooo! That dude! The one who had the vampire list right at the end of the season, & Josef would do it *nods*
 

13. If you got the chance to visit the set for either show #3 or show #5, which would you choose?
You evil peoplesssss! But I think ultimately, I'd want to visit the Hub, despite the fact that I'd get to go to America otherwise

14. If you could date anyone from any of these shows, which show and which person?
Torchwood's Rhys <3 cos Gwen seems to do all of the cheating & I want her to suffer for a change xD

15. If you could change the role of one character in show #1, who would it be and what would you change? 
I know I will be cursed for this [cos she is an incredible villian] but I'd have Coralinne become a good guy & then Mick, Logan, her & Josef could become one big kick ass vampire army to protect LA.
 

Duuuuuuuude! How frickin' amazing was Heroes on BBC Three tonight?! & Claire & Peter are kicking ass again together. This makes me freakishly happy <3

Just a quick entry to say, to say see you all in a couple of days! I'm off to harass the Torchwood lot & dress up as Robin Hood. *giggles* It's going to be immense!

Have a good couple of days & I promise they'll be a biiiiig update when I get back

Much love xx

Work used to be fun, used to be aligh with people I actually cared about. Then those people turned against me. Even my ex-manager doesn't seem to want to talk to me, & Maxine only speaks to me cos she's worried she'll lose her job if she stays reclusive. I still like the people I work with, but there seems to be a "group" being formed again [just like the Amy/Maxine/Shell one before] I feel that the only person I can talk to in that place & be completely honest with is Ronnie these days. She never judges me & tbh I think she feels the same about me. We share everything that bothers us with each other & she'll let me know if there's any bitching going on. It's really hard to believe she's more than 30 years older than I am. I'm sick of my hours being cut. I know I wanted them cut but I only wanted like an extra day off or something, yet I've earnt 30 pounds less than I normally do. & people seem to be getting the time off they want after I've asked & tried to neogotiate [sp?] to have it off. I actually had somewhere booked, but noooooooo the "special bunch" get top priority. I don't think I mean to bitch but I'm mad at my brother, I put false nails on my mum & got the glue all over my habds which won't come off,  I have PMT, I feel sick for no reason & I have a headache that I'm making worse by listening to loud music & shouting at my brother. I didn't have a very good day at work either, 4 hour shifts make me groggy cos there's nothing to do in the afternoons so I was made to do some heavy cleaning. I desperately need a new job but the reality is it's so hard to get one right now that it doesn't seem worth trying. Urgh, I'm bringing myself further down & acting like my life is so hard when really it isn't, I just need some perspective.
Nan gave me a newspaper cutting with a childcare training group on it, so I might find some time to have a look later on. It's got to be better than the crap I have a work now, anything would be better than putting up with that.

Bah, after that rant I could do with some chocolate... appologies for going on =/

On the plus side, I've had a letter confirming the Torchwood con, my new bag came & I got my Superman/girl/woman/dude xD tshirt. However, I am sending my new phone straight back! I'm not going into it because I'll start another rant & bore you all over again. & I finished Primeval series 2 re-watch [minus episode 3 cos it bores me...] I think next series, aside from focussing on the new characters & aftermath of Stephens death, might well see Abby & Con together, finally! <3

Well, that's about it, sorry to have banged on though I do feel miles better than when I first started the entry =) Really don't want to go to work tomorrow, but I'll have something hyperactive-inducing before I start, try & make the ill-feeling go away.

Much love x

OMG! The dog passed his bronze dog test xD He is now officially "A good citizen" xD I can't get over it. Bless his paws, he did foul up a little bit, but mostly cos of me. So proud of him though <3

Today has been unproductive. I had a St Trinians moment & had to watch the film, & also a Primeval moment. I'd forgotten how much I love my Primeval team <3 Especially Abby & Con <3

Much love xx

Hola! =D

So, I have calmed down from last night & for once I am grinning like an idiot. I'm off to The Hub [Torchwood Convention] in just under two weeks. I need some time off work, it's beginning to bug me & I guess Amy was right, my new manager can be a pain. Saturday was just too busy. I came in late & she gave me evils, but then the new assistant manager was nearly half an hour lae & she was fine with her. So I was a bit pissed off. I only worked till 4 though, I'm grateful I didn't have to do any cleaning up cos I was so shattered. I decided to get my top ear pierced after work on a whim. I had wanted it done for a while but after numerous horror stories about ears swelling & pain I'd been kind of put off, especially as I don't have a very high pain threshold xD But I decided if I was ever going to have it done, it needed to be then

Excuse the bad quality, it was taken with my phone as the camera was playing up *rolls eyes*
 
I've also decided [in the words of Cady Harron in Mean Girls] to suck the poison out of my life. So I'm cutting Amy out of my life. I tried to get her to meet up with me on Friday, but she refused claiming that everything had already been said & done. I won't delete her from my phone book yet, or Facebook for that matter. I don't know why & it's hardly sticking to my guns, but I am breaking all contact with her. She was dragging me down to her level & quite often bought out the worst in me.The irony is that we did have fun in the process *rolls eyes*

& also does anyone use Paypal, cos I could really use a little help if anyone can offer some advice?

This entry is for Shambles, because she requested it <3

JUST ABOUT TO BOOK HUB TICKETS TO SEE JOHNGARETHKAI&NAOKO WITH TWO SPECIAL GUESTS THAT COULD BE EVE&BURN 

/capslock abuse

*hyperventilates*

*breathes*

*spazzes*

Just a quick hello, I'm meeting up with Adam in a couple of hours =P It's so cold here today, I have no idea what to wear later & whether I'll be warm enough or not...

Work was so pointless today, I did three hours of nothing. & I'm not sure my new assistant manager likes me tbh. We didn't talk much, only when other people were with us. It's only the first day though so we'll see.

The course is going fine & I'm really enjoying it. We did all work today, although we did do some cutting & sticking which was a good laugh. My folder's actually starting to look full now though =D

Anyway, will catch up with you all later. 

EDIT: Just realised I have no John Barrowman icon! =O

I like my nails being freaky =P My toes are red & black, & my finger nails are clear [mainly because if I forget to take the varnish off for work on Wednesday it won't be so obvious!] I actually feel pretty girly with clear nails *shrugs* 

I was only supposed to work an 8-2 shift today, but the assistant manager didn't show up so I had to work till 5 =( At least I had a dinner hour today though! & I have tomorrow off, my course on Wednesday morning, three hours in the afternoon & then only 4 hours on Friday, it's quite a nice week tbh. 
Speaking of work, it's a customers son's birthday in a couple of weeks & I'm taking them both to the Sealife Center. I couldn't think of anything to get for him, & so I figured I'd pay for him to go & buy him something there. & plus, it's a chance to visit my childhood xD He was being so lovely today & wanted some attention, so I snatched five minutes to pick him up & tickle him. I dote on that child & all my colleagues tell me off =P 

I was completely baffled by the Strictly result on Sunday! I know it was likely that Gillian would be first off, but I guess I'm a bit miffed cos Anton never has the chance to progress too far as he's always given "the older lady" Mum says it's because he's so patient but meh. Hopefully next year he'll get someone younger who can push =D Still in love with the V-Man <3 

I saw Adam today =D I'm always sooo nervous around him & I know there's no need to be, we're going for some dinner on Wednesday evening so I shall keep you all posted. Gahhhh I have butterflies thinking about it already xD 

& finally, how good is Secret Diary of a Call Girl this series?! Alex & Belle <3

I am so knackered! I worked my lunch break on Thursday because we're understaffed, I think I may have snatched ten minutes? & then I worked half an hour of my dinner yesterday. I wish they'd sort this problem out, apparently we don't need the staff, but blatently now if both me & my manager aren't having full dinner hours they we need someone to help cover. Meh <_< We'll be getting the new assistant manager next week too...

Strictly has got really intense all of a sudden, & people are coming out of the woodwork who I wasn't sure would do so well! I <3 Vincent Simone! He's such a flirt & him & Rachel make the perfect combo <3 & I'm so chuffed that Cherie Lunghi did so well. I never expected that kind of standard from her! Sooo looking forward to tomorrow nights show, Jill & Darren are dancing again *squee*

I'm going to go & watch Moonlight. I've been thinking of a certain scene from epiosde 13 allllll day, so I'm off to re-live the memory <3 Then I'll go to bed xD

I am utterly in love with this Josh Groban track <3

How does a Heroes fan forget the season started in the US last night?! Bad me! So I've found somewhere to watch it, seeing a YouTube is so incredibly unreliable these days <_< I'll review afterwards. I wasn't so excited about season 2 till the end, I think mainly due to the writers strike & the season having been so cut short but this season's really grabbed my attention. Looking forward to seeing what happens to Nikki & Nathan. & I wonder what become of Claire & Peter this year...

I think I'll update my interests whilst I wait =P

So as you may have noticed, I've added a different layout [I've actually had this one before] I loved my other one, but I figured it's time for a change for a while, cos sometimes, change isn't all bad =D

Life seems to be going my way at the moment. I'm starting to feel that the issue connected to work has faded [I've never spoken about it, but lets just say I'd need several LJ cuts!] & I generally feel happier. I've started my Lighthouse Project course & so far so good. I won't be qualified at the end of it, but I've got something to start over again with, plus I think it'll be yet another confidence boost =)

I'm so glad Strictly Come Dancing is back *grins like a geeky loon* Not quite sure who I'll be backing, but Vincent needs some love this year & Rachel seems [so far] to showing signs of potential. I'm not really sure about the girls this year though, there was so much hype & some amazing dancers last year that I'm not sure they'll match them. In fact, I think a lot of the boys have more potential than the girls this year. & John is soooo much better than people first thought! I think, I'm leaning towards Rachel & Vincent, Cherie & James, Mark & Hayley and Tom & Camilla, so we'll see how they pan out over the next few weeks. & I hope Anton gets some love this year too! He's not had too much luck previously!

Anyone catch Merlin? I had to laugh. I'd read an interview with Eve Myles about two hours before I sat down to watch it & she said 'People won't recognise me, I'm a witch' & I though, of fair enough, & then right at the beginning of the show, this woman started talking in obvious Welsh tones & I was in stitches. Cue odd looks from my dad *rolls eyes* She was amazing though. A complete change from her Torchwood role. & it wasn't too bad at all. Little cheesy, but cheese is always good!

I wish Adam would text me though =(

PS: I'm off to see Mamma Mia again this week, probably a sing-along. Well, you've got to haven't you? *giggles*

I'm here to OMFG! SPOOKS: CODE 9! Why did you torture me with that ending =( & the worse thing was, you left it on a cliffhanger!Tell me Mrs Beeb, are you giving me a new series or not? & are you happy that you have an unashamed Code 9 fangirl going mad for the next however long it takes to make the new series? *cries*

For starters I apologise for the emo-ness of this entry. I'm feeling kinda strange tonight & I have the feeling you get when your sinus' hurt when you have a cold, but it's like making me want to cry, if you understand me. I don't know why I'm upset tbh. I guess there's a lot happening & changing in my life right now & I'm confused about where I'm going & what I'm doing. 

Today I was re-offered the chance to act a manager for the company for three days while the manager & assistant manager had clashing holidays. I didn't want to do it to begin with, I outright said no way based on some information that I didn't have [ie: how to do it] & also that my assistant manager warned me it wasn't such a good idea & my manager shouldn't really have asked me. But they're really desperate & besides, it's kind of a cool challenge really. We'll have another manager from another shop come in & do all the banking of the money. I just have to be in a hour earlier than usual, open & close the shop & sort out change for the tills, I'm sure I'll be ok. But when I told some of the other staff, they weren't too happy about a 20 year old being above them =/ I doubt many of them bar a couple, will be very supportive. There's an awful lot of sneaky game playing at work atm, regarding holidays, days off & hours & a lot of people who I used to really love & look up to are starting to come out of their shells. It saddens me to think that these people were once so lovely. In a strange way, I think this might be why I'm upset. 

I've also come to realise that I miss loads of people. I know we can never go back to the way we were at school, but I can't help but feel that I'll always feel younger than my friends because I am a simple person & small things make me smile, like they do for a child. This was addressed when I met up with a few old friends recently. I really miss my ex-best mate too. Since her boyfriend came into her life, I've seen her like three times? As I typed, she's my ex-best friend now, possibly only just a face I know. It's amazing to think we were once so close.  

Maybe this is me growing up, but it can't be because it's so painful. I haven't even cried once today, I think I welled up a bit just before dinner but I won't let myself cry properly in fear I'll show my emotions [which is also unlike me, I cry all the time] I know it's not that time of the month even. I just wish I knew what was wrong. 

& it doesn't help that one of Belle's blogs had me close to tears too =(

So I completely suck at Guitar Hero xD I've wanted it for ages on the DS, but my brothers mate bought it round for PS2 tonight, & we've been obsessed with it allll night =P I'm lame at Knights of Cydonia, but I love it too much to not play it. The lads have just gone out but I might see if I can weedle some more time on there after =D

Still reading Belle's blogs. Here lists make me happy xD

Belle DE [xD] Jour is a living legend! I've recently come across the online blogs & she just has this amazing way of writing that draws you in immediately. & she speaks really fondly of Billie Piper as well <3 

How is everyone?
